overview:
Ben is a London-based management consultant specialising in public-sector IT, a co-founder and advisor to the SME VoIP service Pibbix and a mobile technology blogger at The Really Mobile Project.

Ben specialises in ITIL-based service management, technical architecture and client advisory roles supporting financial services, central government and law-enforcement organisations. He has particular experience in supplier management for multi-vendor projects and service delivery organisations, typically providing an interface between subject-matter experts and C-level management. He also has recent experience of large ICT-procurement for UK central government departments.
